AbapdocConf.description:
Various checks regarding abapdoc. Base rule checks for existence of abapdoc for
public class methods and all interface methods.

checkLocal.description: Check local classes and interfaces for abapdoc.

exclude.description: List of file regex patterns to exclude

reason.description: An explanation for why the rule is enforced

InStatementIndentationConf.description:
Checks alignment within block statement declarations which span multiple lines, such as multiple conditions in IF statements.
Example:

  2 = 2.

NewlineBetweenMethodsConf.description: Checks for newlines between method implementations.

count.description: Amount of newlines, works in conjunction with "newlineLogic"

exclude.description: List of file regex patterns to exclude

logic.description:
Exact: the exact number of required newlines between methods is defined by "newlineAmount"

Less: the required number of newlines has to be less than "newlineAmount"

reason.description: An explanation for why the rule is enforced

NoPublicAttributesConf.description:
Checks that classes and interfaces don't contain any public attributes.
Exceptions are excluded from this rule.

allowReadOnly.description: Allows public attributes, if they are declared as READ-ONLY.

exclude.description: List of file regex patterns to exclude

reason.description: An explanation for why the rule is enforced

SequentialBlankConf.description: Checks that code does not contain more than the configured number of blank lines in a row.

exclude.description: List of file regex patterns to exclude

lines.description:
An equal or higher number of sequential blank lines will trigger a violation.
Example: if lines = 3, a maximum of 2 is allowed.

reason.description: An explanation for why the rule is enforced

SevenBitAsciiConf.description: Only allow characters from the 7bit ASCII set.

reason.description: An explanation for why the rule is enforced

ShortCaseConf.description: Checks for CASE statements which have fewer than the specified number of branches

exclude.description: List of file regex patterns to exclude

length.description:
The smallest number of WHEN branches which will trigger a violation.
Example: if length = 1, at least 2 branches are required

reason.description: An explanation for why the rule is enforced
